definition: sticky/glutinous/(Tw) to adhere/to stick on/to glue
earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: I need one, and your sons-in-law can dig new clay for Susana.
sentences.chinese: 我需要一把锹，你的女婿可以帮苏姗娜挖新的黏土。

sentences.english: The new system is made of single amphoteric surfactant and clay stabilizer.
sentences.chinese: 该体系由单一两性表面活性剂和黏土稳定剂组成。

sentences.english: One of her assignments is to form a lump of clay into a block and then measure the dimensions of the block.
sentences.chinese: 她的一项任务是形成黏土团入块然后测量块的维度。

sentences.english: Besides, the author makes use of traditional puppets and plasticine as well.
sentences.chinese: 此外，作者利用传统木偶和塑性黏土以及。

sentences.english: A patina of earthen clay or sandstone helps fit your landscape into its native surroundings.
sentences.chinese: 一个土黏土或砂岩帕蒂娜有助于适应环境的原生景观。

sentences.english: So he spent the next four hours painstakingly working with clay to make a tiny bike.
sentences.chinese: 于是他花了四个小时小心翼翼地用黏土做微型脚踏车。

sentences.english: Clay that, when fired, assumes a colour ranging from dull ochre to red.
sentences.chinese: 经烧制后其颜色从淡赭到红色不等的粗而多孔的黏土。

sentences.english: Parters potters add water to soften the clay.
sentences.chinese: 陶瓷工人在黏土中加入水分使它软化。

sentences.english: Loams are easy soils to work and combine the good properties of sandy and clay soils.
sentences.chinese: 这种土壤利于种植，并具有沙土和黏土的优点。

sentences.english: Entering and opening clay for ceramic mugs can be done with the thumbs.
sentences.chinese: 进入开放的陶瓷杯黏土可以用大拇指。

sentences.english: And a small cabin build there, of clay and wattles made.
sentences.chinese: 那里有一间小房子建好，是黏土和木框建成的。

sentences.english: This seam of coal reposes on a layer of clay.
sentences.chinese: 这个煤层处于一层黏土岩之上。

sentences.english: Bricks and dishes are made from various kinds of clay.
sentences.chinese: 砖和盘子由各种黏土制成。

sentences.english: Lay a layer of clay on the displayed layout prior to an relayr_ design.
sentences.chinese: 接力赛之前在显现的铺排上铺一层黏土。

sentences.english: As to the fireclay brick, in which both the phase composition and microstructure show no obvious change.
sentences.chinese: 黏土砖的物相组成和显微结构都没有发生明显的变化。

sentences.english: Much clay is used for bricks.
sentences.chinese: 大量的黏土被用来造砖。
